alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ORLEANS...MONROE AND GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hamlin Beach State Park to near Akron. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Batavia, Brockport, Albion, Hilton, Webster, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Hamlin Beach State Park, Le Roy, Pembroke, Spencerport, Pavilion, Byron, Scottsville, Churchville, and Oakfield. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 47 and 48A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
